    • Constructor Detail

      • SpenBulletParagraph

        public SpenBulletParagraph()

        Since:

      • SpenBulletParagraph

        public SpenBulletParagraph(int startPosition,
                   int endPosition,
                   int type)
        Creates an SpenBulletParagraph instance with the paragraph properties.
        Parameters:
        startPosition - The start position of paragraph. The position should not be negative number. The negative number will be ignored.
        endPosition - The end position of paragraph. The position should not be negative number. The negative number will be ignored.
        type - The bullet type.
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - If the endPosition is smaller than the startPosition. If the expansionType is negative or lager than the SpenTextSpanBase.SPAN_EXCLUSIVE_INCLUSIVE.
        IllegalArgumentException - If the type is not TYPE_NONE and TYPE_CHECKER, TYPE_SOLID_CIRCLE.
        Since:
        4.0.0

    • Method Detail

      • setBulletType

        public void setBulletType(int type)
        Sets the bullet type.
        Parameters:

        Since:

        See Also:
        getBulletType(), TYPE_NONE, TYPE_CHECKER, TYPE_SOLID_CIRCLE
